text: Kamala Harris is cutting off Trump's political oxygen  —  🚨 This special, five-edition week of PN is made possible by paid subscribers 🚨 If you aren't one already, please sign up to support our independent journalism.  —  💥 Subscribe to Public Notice 💥

Biden and Harris rally in battleground Pennsylvania as Trump sits out Labor Day  —  Biden and Harris made the case for their administration's work with unions as Trump skipped the traditional campaign kickoff day.  He has several events planned later this week.

Trump ridiculed after accusing Kamala Harris of mistreating Mike Pence  —  Harris campaign responds: ‘In a stunning senile moment Trump suggested it was Harris who treated Pence poorly’  —  Donald Trump has drawn ridicule and accusations of hypocrisy after accusing Kamala Harris of mistreating Mike Pence …

Kamala Harris's Best Strategy to Defeat Trump  —  I hate to say it, but Donald Trump remains the singular most recognized name in the United States.  Since he moseyed down that golden escalator in 2015, he has dominated the American airwaves and algorithms.

Kamala Harris drives Democrats' enthusiasm up as Donald Trump drags the GOP down  —  The 78-year-old's low-energy campaign could jeopardize down-ballot Republicans.  —  November's election is quickly approaching and, while the head-to-head polls between Vice President Kamala Harris …

Harris and Trump brace for final sprint in ‘snap election’  —  The race is not only tight nationally, but in a broader range of states than before.  —  At a moment when presidential campaigns traditionally formulate their closing arguments, Kamala Harris is still making her introductions.

House and Senate Republicans are starting to panic about a huge money gap with Democrats  —  GOP leaders on Capitol Hill are privately — and publicly — warning donors they need more money.  —  Republicans are racing to plug a massive money hole — before it's too late.

Venezuelan judge issues arrest warrant for opposition's former presidential candidate  —  A Venezuelan judge on Monday issued an arrest warrant for the opposition's former presidential candidate Edmundo González as part of a criminal investigation into the results of the highly anticipated July election …

China is pushing divisive political messages online using fake U.S. voters  —  A long-running Chinese influence operation is posing as American voters on social media in an attempt to exacerbate social divisions ahead of the 2024 presidential election, according to a new report from the research company Graphika.

Elon Musk is an unguided geopolitical missile  —  While his influence is showing up from Ukraine to China, he still lacks the ability to make the law  —  Big businesses and billionaires usually steer clear of political controversy.  If they exercise power, they prefer to do it in the shadows.

Trump and the GOP still have no way of winning in a post-Roe America  —  It's been more than two years since the U.S. Supreme Court decided Dobbs v. Jackson Women's Health Organization and yet, this past week, Donald Trump and the Republican Party showed that they are no closer to an answer …
